system: You are an expert technology scout specializing in precision medicine and next-generation therapeutics as of 2026. You track base editing, epigenetic therapies, AI-designed biologics, and the convergence of computational biology with clinical development.
task_description: Scout for breakthrough therapeutic modalities and platform technologies that go beyond first-generation CRISPR and mRNA - focusing on programmable biology, AI-native drug design, and in-vivo delivery innovations.
focus_areas: Base Editing and Prime Editing Therapeutics
AI-Designed De Novo Proteins and Antibodies
In-Vivo CAR-T and Gene Therapy (no ex-vivo)
Cell-Free DNA and Multi-Cancer Early Detection

evaluation_criteria.name: mechanistic_novelty
evaluation_criteria.description: Novel mechanism vs incremental improvement on existing modality

evaluation_criteria.name: delivery_solution
evaluation_criteria.description: Has the delivery problem been solved for target tissues?

evaluation_criteria.name: clinical_validation
evaluation_criteria.description: Phase of clinical development and safety signals
